mapper.select: SELECT board.* , FORMAT(board.price, 0) "price" , LENGTH(board.likes) - LENGTH(REPLACE(board.likes, ',', '')) "likeCount" FROM smile.board_trade board, smile.user user WHERE (user.nickname LIKE '%${searchByNickname}%' AND board.identity LIKE '%${searchByBoardIdentity}%' AND board.likes LIKE '%${searchByLikeUser}%') AND board.user = user.identity ORDER BY identity DESC LIMIT ${start}, 5

SELECT board.identity, board.title, board.content, board.created, board.contacted, board.imgPath, board.status, FORMAT(board.price, 0) "price", board.address, board.user, user.nickname, board.likes FROM smile.board_trade board, smile.user user WHERE board.identity = #{identity} AND user.identity = board.user
mapper.update: UPDATE board_trade SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, price = #{price}, contacted = #{contacted}, address = #{address} where identity=#{identity}
UPDATE board_trade SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, price = #{price}, imgPath = #{imgPath}, contacted = #{contacted}, address = #{address} where identity=#{identity}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(tel) FROM smile.user WHERE tel = ${tel} AND identity = ${user}
mapper.update: UPDATE smile.board_trade SET likes = CASE WHEN likes LIKE '%, ${user}%' THEN REPLACE(likes, ', ${user}', '') ELSE CONCAT(likes, ', ', ${user}) END WHERE identity = ${identity};
